faqs.question: What is the best time to book a flight?
faqs.answer: It is recommended to book flights at least 2-3 weeks in advance to get the best deals.

faqs.question: How can I change my hotel reservation?
faqs.answer: You can change your hotel reservation by contacting the hotel directly or through the booking platform.

faqs.question: What should I do if my flight is delayed?
faqs.answer: If your flight is delayed, contact the airline staff for assistance and stay updated on the new departure time.

faqs.question: Are car rentals available at the airport?
faqs.answer: Yes, most airports have car rental services available at their terminals.
